post.subject: 🎁"Stock Up" Web Event Rewards Can Now Be Claimed
post.content: Dear Proxies: Welcome to New Eridu! In-game rewards for Zenless Zone Zero's "Stock Up" web event can now be claimed~ Participate now: https://hoyo.link/a0yiFOAL Proxies who have already participated in the event can follow the link to go to the event page. Select "Claim Rewards" on the "Inventory" screen, then after selecting the server and corresponding account you would like your rewards to be sent to, the rewards that were put in your inventory can be claimed. It doesn't matter if you are a veteran or a newcomer, all are welcome at Drip Fest! Here, you can create to your heart's content! Unleash your drip, define your art! Join creators from around the world and build New Eridu together! Stay tuned for more details! Honorary Event Ambassador: Starlight Knight Billy ❤
